snippet: The Shaw neighborhood, site of an urban renewal effort begun in the late 1960s, is now attracting millennials looking for an urban lifestyle.
abstract: Maryland-based developer JBG has carefully orchestrated revival of Washington, DC, neighborhood of Shaw; firm is marketing portion of area that was devastated by 1968 riots following assassination of Rev Dr Martin Luther King Jr as North End Shaw, and has worked to draw trendy stores as part of strategy to take advantage of gentrification and white millennials who are increasingly moving to area.
lead_paragraph: The Shaw neighborhood, site of an urban renewal effort begun in the late 1960s, is now attracting millennials looking for an urban lifestyle.

headline.main: Washington’s Shaw Neighborhood Is Remade for Young Urbanites
headline.print_headline: Washington Neighborhood Is Remade for Young Urbanites
